body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for reaching out to Speedy Motors Customer Support. My name is Jeffrey Murphy. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Jeffrey! My name is Janice Johnson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Janice! How can I assist you today? Can I have your phone number to better assist you in case we get disconnected?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course! My phone number is seven two four five six five eight nine one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Janice. One last thing, could you provide me with your email address so I can keep you updated on the status of your inquiry?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure thing! My email address is janice.johnson@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Janice, for sharing your contact details. I'll do my best to resolve your concern. Could you please explain the issue you are facing with the shipping of your vehicle?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I had some concerns about the delivery date, but your team has been very helpful in providing updates. I'm feeling relieved now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Janice! Thank you for sharing that feedback with us. If you have any further questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to us. Thank you for your time today!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Jeffrey! I appreciate your assistance. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Janice! Have a wonderful day too!
